title: 韶華三思
author: 吉祥米鹿
description:
青春就是一部三部曲，青澀純真、迷茫懵懂到自我成長，都是青春賦予的每個人的特色，時間讓一切變成落子無悔的選擇，我們做的只能遵從自己的本心，不放棄，不猶豫，勇敢往前，去追尋自我的內心。
女主：淡然從容
男主：冷靜深情
內容标簽：都市 花季雨季 甜文 輕松
其它：校園，青春，社會，友情，愛情
description_translated:
Youth is a trilogy: from innocent naivety and confusion to self-growth, each stage is a unique characteristic bestowed upon everyone by youth. Time transforms everything into choices made without regret. All we can do is follow our hearts, never give up, never hesitate, and bravely move forward to pursue our inner selves.
Female Lead: Calm and composed
Male Lead: Cool and affectionate
Tags: Urban, Youthful, Sweet, Lighthearted
Others: Campus, Youth, Society, Friendship, Love
